attributes.action: I want CCTV cameras be put up
attributes.additional_details: when I have spoken to other residents  they have got family and friends there   my dad is there stuff has been taken off  add family and friends cemetery   someone has been taking it off       stealing it   after we have made a family and friends looks really nice there we all can't keep   forking out for stuff all the time stuff has been stolen   everyone find it hard
attributes.background: spoken to the local council when I have spoken to them   no they won't put CCTV cameras up  when they have had one of their meetings  there was  discussion about it therefore it wouldn't be nice  for CCTV cameras be put up  without arts in the residents first of Houghton Regis

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the local council.
